availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Native of Russia. Married to Simon Livingston. Mother of Louis Livingston, Sarah Livingston, and Joseph Livingston. Resident of Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 466A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cook County, Chicago, Enumeration District: 010, p. 259B.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cook County, Chicago, Ward 4, Enumeration District: 0103, p. 2.
KYR-0001-004-1388.
